thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 2 of 289
thread.title: Tara

author: Tara
title: Tara
text: I ordered tickets on this website for an ACC Tournament game. I specifically ordered tickets with a section and seat number at a premium so that I didn't have to deal with the uncertainty of the GA tickets. When the tickets came in the mail they were General Admission tickets. This is not ok. I am going to report this and ask for a refund because I would never have purchased these tickets.
